content.raw: In message creation unit, It is better to use the same information order as it is in Simspark. For example, In simspark messages, the gyro info is before the perception info. In my test, some beginner teams use the order of information in their parser algorithm, so if we change this order, they should also reprogram their parser code
content.html: In message creation unit, It is better to use the same information order as it is in Simspark. For example, In simspark messages, the gyro info is before the perception info. In my test, some beginner teams use the order of information in their parser algorithm, so if we change this order, they should also reprogram their parser code
